ThingDef.label: Torso
ThingDef.description: The human body apart from the head, neck, arms, and legs.

ThingDef.label: Waist
ThingDef.description: The typically narrowed part of the body between the hips and chest or upper back.

ThingDef.label: Stomach
ThingDef.description: The organ used for digesting food.

ThingDef.label: Neck
ThingDef.description: The bodypart that connects the head with the body.

ThingDef.label: Head
ThingDef.description: The base of operations for the human body that controls most of its movements.

ThingDef.label: Brain
ThingDef.description: The nervous center of the body that controls all of its actions and thoughts.

ThingDef.label: Eye
ThingDef.description: A specialized light-sensitive sensory structure of the body that is the image-forming organ of sight.

ThingDef.label: Ear
ThingDef.description: The sensory structure of the body used for hearing.

ThingDef.label: Nose
ThingDef.description: The part of the face that bears the nostrils and covers the anterior part of the nasal cavity.

ThingDef.label: Jaw
ThingDef.description: The parts constituting the walls of the mouth and serving to open and close it.

ThingDef.label: Shoulder
ThingDef.description: The part of the body that connects the torso with the arms.

ThingDef.label: Arm
ThingDef.description: The part of the body used for various precise actions.

ThingDef.label: Hand
ThingDef.description: The ending part of the arm.

ThingDef.label: Finger
ThingDef.description: Any of the five terminating members of the hand.

ThingDef.label: Leg
ThingDef.description: A limb used especially for supporting the body and for walking.

ThingDef.label: Foot
ThingDef.description: The ending part of the leg.

ThingDef.label: Toe
ThingDef.description: Any of the five terminating members of the foot.

ThingDef.label: Ribcage
ThingDef.description: A paired, curved bony rod that stiffens the walls of the body and protects the viscera.

ThingDef.label: Spine
ThingDef.description: The axial skeleton that consists of an articulated series of vertebrae which extend from the neck to the tail and protect the spinal cord.

ThingDef.label: Clavicle
ThingDef.description: A bone of the shoulder girdle typically serving to link the scapula and sternum.

ThingDef.label: Sternum
ThingDef.description: A compound ventral bone or cartilage of most vertebrates other than fishes that connects the ribs or the shoulder girdle or both and in humans consists of the manubrium, gladiolus, and xiphoid process.

ThingDef.label: Humerus
ThingDef.description: The long bone of the upper arm or forelimb extending from the shoulder to the elbow.

ThingDef.label: Radius
ThingDef.description: The bone on the thumb side of the human forearm.

ThingDef.label: Pelvis
ThingDef.description: A basin-shaped structure in the skeleton of many vertebrates that is formed by the pelvic girdle and adjoining bones of the spine.

ThingDef.label: Femur
ThingDef.description: The proximal bone of the hind or lower limb that extends from the hip to the knee.

ThingDef.label: Tibia
ThingDef.description: The inner and usually larger of the two bones of the vertebrate hind or lower limb between the knee and ankle.
